setName: Scroll of the Embered City's Hero

setEffects.2: When a nearby party member triggers a Nightsoul Burst, the equipping character regenerates 6 Energy.
setEffects.4: When the equipping character triggers an Elemental Reaction involving their Elemental Type, all nearby party members of Elemental Types involved in that reaction gain 12% All Elemental and Physical DMG Bonus for 10s. When the equipping character is in Nightsoul's Blessing when triggering this, an additional 28% All Elemental and Physical DMG Bonus will be granted to characters for 20s. The above effect can be triggered even if the character is off-field. DMG Bonuses provided by Artifact Sets with the same name will not stack.

flower.name: Beast Tamer's Talisman
flower.desc: A flower carved from flint and Drakite, signifying that its bearer is qualified to become a beast tamer.

plume.name: Mountain Ranger's Beacon
plume.desc: A guidepost used by mountain rangers to mark out paths. Their bird-feather shapes make them very eye-catching indeed.

sands.name: Mystic's Gold Platter
sands.desc: A golden plate shaped like a sun. The draconic patterns on it seem to symbolize the cycle of life and death.

goblet.name: Wandering Scholar's Claw Cup
goblet.desc: A strange goblet strikingly akin in shape to a dragon's claw. Its maker must have made it with something special in mind.

circlet.name: Magical Warrior's Feather Mask
circlet.desc: A feather mask with falcon-esque plumage. Many legends surround this object.
